hero-description: Join the MapSwipe community and make a meaningful impact on mapping and beyond.
mobilizing-volunteer: Mobilizing volunteer power to improve humanitarian response worldwide.
mobilizing-volunteer-description-paragra: Geospatial data and technologies have revolutionized community engagement and the way people interact with their environments. The MapSwipe app harnesses volunteer power to contribute to important geospatial projects, making a significant impact.
Utilizing these tools allows for targeted, efficient, and responsive efforts in community development, climate change, and humanitarian initiatives.
explore-mission-types-description: Our volunteers contribute to three different project types.
partners-description: MapSwipe is part of the Missing Maps Project and is managed by a volunteer-led team from these member organizations.
